/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses, painted in a palette of blues, whites, and reds, fill the street, hinting at the city's dynamic pace of life. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, with the sun shining brightly in the top left corner, casting shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and vehicles.
